channel.title: Fixing Dupe PI 317
channel.description: Hey guys , soo players can dupe on my server if they are able to move while in trade by clicking the mini-map, so if i stop the mini-map movement (or anymovement at all) while in trade its an easy fix. but i dont know the code to stop movement , and where to put the code . greatly appreciated if you help, thanks :) THE BASE IS PI 317
